name: 电火猫
description: 浑身毛发带有静电的小猫，兴奋时会噼里啪啦地放电。喜欢在雷雨天外出玩耍。

features: 黄色的蓬松毛发总是炸开

ecology.habitat: 雷雨频繁的草原和山脚

image_prompts.design: A small kitten with fluffy yellow fur that stands on end from static electricity. Lightning bolt-shaped tail tip, eyes occasionally spark with electricity. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on fur spikes, ink sketch texture on electric patterns, non-reflective surface with matte yellow tones, cute and energetic appearance.
